summary: A fantasy ENB Preset optimized for Climates of Tamriel
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/XIuuQF9.png[/img][/center]


[center]This ENB Preset is a fantasy preset which was created to be compatible with Climates of Tamriel.


[color=#6d9eeb][size=6][i]Features[/i][/size][/color]

Depth of Field
Compatible with Climates of Tamriel
SMAA
Bloom
Palette[/center]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/tFtoZvh.png[/img]


[center][youtube]1K6cBxj6SII[/youtube][/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/EKjncmG.png[/img]

1. Download and install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates of Tamriel[/url]. To do this, please follow the instructions on the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates of Tamriel[/url] Nexus page.
2. Download the ENB version 308 from [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0308.htm]ENBdev[/url].
3. Extract all the files within the "Wrapper" directory in the archive into your Skyrim folder (.../steamapps/common/skyrim).
4. Download my ENB preset and extract all the files in the archive into your Skyrim folderÂ (.../steamapps/common/skyrim). Overwrite all files if asked.
5. Set the following values in your SkyrimPrefs.ini (.../documents/my games/skyrim) and save the file:

[center][color=#6d9eeb]iMaxAnisotropy=0
iMultiSample=0
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1[/color][/center]

[center][u]Important:[/u] If you are using Mod Organizer, please set these values with the Ini Editor.[/center]

6. You are done, enjoy!

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/RiVQF2n.png[/img][/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/ldxLraQ.png[/img]

Special credits go to Boris Vorontsov for creating the ENB binaries!
Also special credits go to soulwynd for providing his awesome [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44752/?]DoF[/url] for ENBs
author: Zeratem
